data.actual_result: The application bounces on the dock when receiving the call, unlike what happens in DnD.
data.expected_result: The application should not bounce as Streamer Mode behaves the same as DND.
data.short_description: [macOS specific] When receiving a call in Streamer Mode whilst in another window, the application bounces on the dock.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Streamer Mode. - Click/CMD+Tab into another window. - Have someone call you. - Notice the application bounce. - If nothing happens, try full screening the application you navigate to, then repeat the steps.
